website_summaries.verdict: Reasonable price for a holster that accommodates many different models of Glock pistols.
pros: Provides more strength and durability than you might expect in this price range
Comfortable to wear, so you can use it in a variety of situations
Security features hold the weapon in place, but also provide quick access as needed
Multiple configurations, so you can find the perfect option
cons: Belt loops may be too large for some people to wear it tightly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Love the safety button. Fits my Glock 19 and 35 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, I’m Running This Holster.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent holster, this is my main holster now for my Glock 19. I use it with the Blackhawk CQC Quick strike to attach to my battle belt. You can adjust the tension of your draw and it comes with the Allen wrench along with a spot to store the wrench on the holster out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: TheRealCardz

customer_reviews.title: Best Retention Holster I Own
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that the person complaining about the holster not being safe or securing their weapon, obviously did not purchase the Level II retention model. This holster is very well made and fits my Gen4 23 like a glove without the scratching and overaggressive contact I get from my other retention holsters. The material is far superior than most of my USA made retention holsters and feels like a quality made holster, not a poorly made plastic toy holster. If you are buying this holster for a Gen5, it may require some minor sanding to allow the right side of the ambidextrous slide release/lock to slide in without forcing it in. Great product. Will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: C.L.

customer_reviews.title: Orpaz holsters are always excellent
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package, holstering my Glock 19 is smooth as butter and there is a "click" when it is in place. But drawing from it is too tight for my liking. Luckily with the included Allen key I am able to loosen it, till the adjustment screw is all the way out and the drawing is smooth as I like. At this point holstering still gets a "click" and the gun won't drop even up side down. Orpaz holsters are made in Israel and the quality is top notch. Even better is that the price is excellent compare to other name brands with similar quality. I have their other holsters for my 1911 and Jericho 941, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fan

customer_reviews.title: COULDN'T BE BETTER...especially for the price...OOPS!!!
customer_reviews.text: $19!?!? What more could you ask for? Fits my Glock 17 Gen 5 PERFECTLY. Don't believe any other reviews that claim it doesn't fit this gun. Wish the gun could be a little closer to the body, but maybe not possible with the mechanics involved. This is a fantastic holster for the price! UPDATE: I have to change my thoughts on this holster because of the seller's lack of concern about a customer after the sale. I felt there was a piece missing and called customer service; left my phone number & a detailed message, only to be ignored. If customer service is poor, the product is poor, IMO. Wouldn't deal with this seller again. Buy a Blackhawk, far superior.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I have used guns and holsters for the past 15 years during my time i have purchased the cheapest ones made and as you know you get what you pay for, i was worried a bit for this kind of holster for be at a decent price but gave it a shot and i love it the retention feature is awesome with out slowing down draw time, the swivel part is the best thing as i do like y weapon slightly canted forward.
customer_reviews.author: M. Londono

customer_reviews.title: Great Holster and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this holster for my Glock Gen-5 MOS and did not know what to expect for the price. It is a great holster! It is made in Israel which should tell you about the quality. That little country has been surrounded by enemies for its entire existence so they have to that both their weapons and equipment function all the time, every time. This holster is no different, it works all the time every time! It will not easily fit a Sam Browne belt without some modification, but well worth it. I ordered another for my cordura belt so I don't have to switch them between the different belts.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pigg

customer_reviews.title: I really love the retention on this holster, wish they supported lights though
customer_reviews.text: So, full disclosure, I no longer use this holster for my EDC but that is purely because I recently added light (Streamlight TLR-8AG) to my Glock and Orpaz does not currently have a version which supports this setup. If that changes in the future, I will purchase this again as the retention, security and ability to customize the angle are all very good.
customer_reviews.author: Matt F.

customer_reviews.title: Great retention
customer_reviews.text: This is great for open carry. It's got retention and it only took me about three draws to understand the position of my grip to get the firearm presented safely and on target. Practice practice practice. I'm used to IWB concealable holsters, but in times on the range where I need a good OWB or in the rare need to carry open in public I needed some level of retention past friction. Nicely built, solid and fit my Glock 17 right out the package. Thanks for an affordable sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Biggar

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit a polymer 80 G19, if you got some extra chunk the release pushes into your gut
customer_reviews.text: You would need to grind off the pointy end of the trigger guard to get a polymer 80 to fit. Plus without a firearm in it on my belt the release pushes into my gut, not comfortable at all. It might have worked if it was as wide.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L. Eakins

customer_reviews.title: Great holster easy to use but safe.
customer_reviews.text: I use my pistol for security purposes. I wear it concealed and have a holster I wear in my waist. This one I needed for practice on the range, and testing by our group. I had a different one before that was a bit of a pain. This one is so smooth to use. I fell in love with it immediately. Safe protection for the gun but easily removed when you want to. I just wish you had something similar for in the waist. Also, maybe one that goes over your belt with a clip instead of through the belt.
customer_reviews.author: Mutty

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This holster is a great value and is everything I expected. I'm impressed with the high quality of material and workmanship and the effective design, especially for the price. One very minor negative is: I have a personal bias against using security head screws (adjustments) when a simple phillips head would suffice. That's only because the more common phillips head screwdriver is usually more accessible when away from the house, shop,or office. That's only a minor inconvenience though and, once the correct driver bit has been obtained, all the tension and position adjustments are straightforward and easily made. I really like this holster and will be returning to Orpaz for other gear. -Stay frosty! -
customer_reviews.author: R.W.

customer_reviews.title: Too much retention
customer_reviews.text: Retention is very strong. Too strong. No choice but to use two hands and really pull to get the gun out. This is with or without the retention screw in. Almost feels like it’s not even made for a Glock, really disappointed. The thumb release would be nice if the retention wasn’t so strong anyway. Edit: After a few wears, it seems good. Maybe just a time of break in was required, but it’s a decent holster for the price. Thumb release is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Cody G.

customer_reviews.title: Best duty holster
customer_reviews.text: Fits my glock 23 perfectly. Very secure, the gun will not release until you press down on the release button and pull up on the gun. I barely feel the gun on my hip, it's that light. I used to have a safariland holster and it was very heavy. I've had this new holster for a few days, so I'm looking forward to taking it to the range. In practicing the draw, it's very smooth coming out and going back in to the holster. No fumbling with the strap. Comes with a hex key to tighten the holster, or adjust the angle.
customer_reviews.author: Jared H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Glock 17,gen3 with micro red dot and threaded barrel!
customer_reviews.author: Kane

customer_reviews.title: Low cost, well made Serpa style holster!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made holster for the price; made in Israel and functions very well. Works best with Glocks, but also works with the Ruger Security-9.
customer_reviews.author: 3rdRangerD

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase : Glock 19
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this holster because the price is right, and I'm used to using the thumb break, as my service holster is a Safariland with a thumb break. The holster was shipped quick. Correct hand orientation (in my case, left). Light weight. Good retention, etc. Would buy again/recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sgt. F

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: Holds my glock 19 very securely, and the release mechanism is very easy and natural to use. Way less rattle than my friend's $80 ALS holster. I got the version that mounts to a molle belt which is a great value compared to other options. Only thing I'd like to see is a version that works with a streamlight attached to the pistol.
customer_reviews.author: Chip

customer_reviews.title: Great quality holster!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Super adjustable, comfortable, and has great retention. Not only does it have great retention, but it also is very fast to draw from when the thumb release is pushed. I'm quite happy with this purchase, it's actually my favorite holster for the range.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dayton

customer_reviews.title: Good value and works well
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and all was as ordered....used for my 17, fits well and draws well...there was some concern as to the mag release button and the edge of the holster being there and may drop a mag from what I read prior to purchase..i see how it could be of concern but it can be shaved down if you don't like it...I have carried guns forever and have not had an issue...good value for the money
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: MODIFICATION TO FIT P80 FRAME
customer_reviews.text: If you want this holster for your P80 PF 9/40 (including C, CL) only one minor modification must be made. Cut a slot on each side of the muzzle area of the holster to allow clearance for the ribs along the dust cover of the p80 frame. The cuts shown in the picture are oversized but work perfectly. This modification could be done with a dremel or file.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, especially for the price. I had none of the 'too tight' problem I read about in the reviews. Fit was perfect from the start. It rides perfectly on the belt and if I would lose a few pounds (ahem), the pistol wouldn't rub my side. I really like this holster. AND, I got another allen wrench for my now huge collection!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Edited: Do not by for GEN 5 Glock 34
customer_reviews.text: Edit: My Glock 34 is a Gen 5, which may be what is causing the issue here. I'm leaving my original comments, however bumping up to a more "neutral" amount of stars. It would be nice if it was more clearly labeled that this product will NOT work in a Gen 5 Glock 34 MOS. Original: This holster does NOT fit a Glock 34. I know we want our firearms secure in the holster, but even with the retention screw totally removed it took two people to remove it from the holster. Will be returning and do NOT recommend for any full framed Glocks.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Drawing was an issue out of the box, it gripped my g17 a little too tight. Some gentle filing of the inside (you can't even tell I did anything really) was all it took. I especially like the angle adjustment. Tends to chafe a little, but I'll chalk that up to wearing a simple leather belt that wasn't really designed with holsters in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The adjustments make this easy to place exactly where you want it. I did have to file the barrel end of the holster just a little to make it easier to draw and reholster. It was just a little too snug and you could see it almost wanting to move the slide when putting the pistol in it. A little adjustment and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally Awesome Hosters!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I think Orpaz holsters are the best on market for thumb release retention devices. There is zero friction in hostering or drawing, yet the pistol is tight when locked in. Outstanding! My only wish is they would offer these holsters for variants - such as a pistol with a rail.
customer_reviews.author: AvidOutdoorsman

customer_reviews.title: //[nice hoLster for fiLm,theatre prop];
customer_reviews.text: //[2019,nov,04,,, bought for performance musicaL theatre roLe as a cop,,,good fiLm,theatre prop,,, fits Ultra-Grade Galaxy M1911 G6 full metal pistoL by ukarms,,, the button on pistoL to reLease the cLip for bbs kept getting pressed when inserting into hoLster,,, removed cLip during rehearsaLs,,,];
customer_reviews.author: aLbert

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal! Only good thing was that his gun fit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this holster for my husband to open carry his glock. He wanted one & I wanted a good deal. I don’t believe one must abandon comfort, safety, style & durability to get a good deal... but in this case that’s what you’ll get! It’s just a hard plastic holster that fits a glock. Period. I traded it off for him & would never make the purchase again or recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Preston

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Good deal but I would not trust my life with this holster. It's a bit on the sticky side as far as the release even after multiple adjustments. I am surprised given the other attention to fit, detail, and finish. I would not recommend for professional use such as police or security detail.
customer_reviews.author: Winsome Losesome

customer_reviews.title: Great holster even though under $25
customer_reviews.text: I just got the Level 1 holster since the one it's for is a truck gun for the desert, and I'll wear it crossdraw. Pistol is a G34 so quite long. My second Orpaz holster and it didn't disappoint. Retention is just fine for my needs after tightening the adjust screw. A+ value.
customer_reviews.author: Doby Pilgrim

customer_reviews.title: Pullout game is strong
customer_reviews.text: Glock 26. Fits well, but the pistol is incredibly hard to draw. I mean, I expect it to be secure, but this is beyond ridiculous. It was fine for my Halloween costume, but in the case where you'd actually have to pull your weapon for an emergency situation, kiss your butt goodbye.
customer_reviews.author: CTCraftBrew

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: This holster is the best (hard shell) MOLLE holster I have tried yet. It doesn't sag and is well balanced on the MOLLE. I like the retention features and they work well. We will see how durable it is in the months to come. I recommend it for a MOLLE platform.
customer_reviews.author: MgM

customer_reviews.title: Can’t say it wasn’t right. It just wasn’t the right fit for us.
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my son to complete his tactical belt and to hold his Glock 19. Did not fit. I can’t send it back because he likes it. Now we’re stuck with a semi functional item. The gun was supposed to be able to sit all the way down in the holster, it’s half way out. So back to the drawing board with me. Also he didn’t like the holster on the belt, hence the need to purchased a totally different one. Definitely would be nice for the next person, just wasn’t right fit for us.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Works great and plenty adjustment if you are a big guy. Would recommend this to any one.
customer_reviews.text: I like how my glock 17 fits and releases with the push of the thumb. I’m a bigger guy, and there is plenty adjustment for the straps to fit my thigh. Hope, this helps out the bigger guys, since I couldn’t find any measurements for it, or any reviews about firmest for bigger guys. I would buy again!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tactical battle belt fits glock 19. 9mm
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my battle belt. Hsgi. I change holsters from hip to drop between shooting courses. This holster worked. Cheaper than other brands works as good. I use this for training only. I have another rig for job use. Update. It's been used on multiple occasions still holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Cowboy

customer_reviews.title: for my Glock 17
customer_reviews.text: bought this to bring camping so if I encountered a bear the bear would have to encounter Mr. Glock I like how the gun stays locked in place unless I push the fun button. the button isn’t a fun button for a bear that’s in front of me while I’m camping, however. no, more like a death button
customer_reviews.author: Brian Miller

customer_reviews.title: My favorite duty holster
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Orpaz holster I've purchased. It's super functional, well designed, and definitely beats my overly priced safariland holster. The modularity of it makes it super versatile from a low ride to attaching it directly to my plate carrier via Molle webing attachment. I plan on purchasing more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Stetts

customer_reviews.title: Release is TIGHT
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it'll break in, but when worn on a belt, I have to hold the release with my left hand to draw with my right. My "thumb" doesn't do much. You need a pretty long, strong thumb to work the release AND draw.
customer_reviews.author: Secti0n31

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for light duty only
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. Function wise it does well, easy to use but can be broken pretty easily.
customer_reviews.author: joetrott

customer_reviews.title: NOT JUNK
customer_reviews.text: DOES NOT FEEL CHEAP. I know you’re probably thinking the same thing I was before I rolled the dice on this holster. Not knowing the company and not finding any completely solid reviews. But this holster blew my expectations out of the water for its price. If I didn’t know how much it cost I would put it in the same ball park as Safariland. I put it through all the test I could think of short of running it over and it held! Heck didn’t even leave a mark! Highly recommend. Fits my G17 gen 4 like OJ’s glove
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah

customer_reviews.title: Nice holster
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my everyday carry. What I did for convenience so I didn't have to take my belt off and on just to put the holster on was cut the bottom notches out so I could take the holster on and off without having to remove my belt worth the buy
customer_reviews.author: BillH

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a drop holster for my Glock 19. I'm used to a SERPA so I was unsure about the thumb release. Very pleasantly surprised. Easy to use, locks in great and the thumb release feels quite natural. I have 0 complaints about this holster. If you have child sized thighs the straps may not fit tight around them but should be fine for most adults.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B.

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Glock 19 gen 5
customer_reviews.text: Product is great as a holster, sadly it does not fit my Glock 19 gen 5. I am going to try and either cut a chip out or sand down the spot it conflicts with to see if it fits. Will update review if I can make it fit. Other then that be sure to have a sturdy belt equipped. The weight of your pistol and the holster will make it pull down a lot on your belt.
customer_reviews.author: Nikoli

customer_reviews.title: Winter-time open-carry solution :)
customer_reviews.text: Great retention with easy thumb release. Draws well without sticking. Comfortable to wear and easy to adjust. It takes some getting used to because it does stick out to the side quite a bit, but it works for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Notsomadmaxine

customer_reviews.title: All in one.
customer_reviews.text: No need to buy a holster and molle adapter. Locks in easy and fit my gen 3 Glock 19 and 17. It does require heavy thumb pressure to unlock but it locks down tight
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, phenomenal.
customer_reviews.text: This is a phenomenal holster system. I have used all varuations of products such as Safariland, Blackhawk and more and have never been as impressed with any of them as I am with this holster. It holds your weapon securely and does not rattle. I have this particular model attached to my war belt and am pleased to say I highly recommend Orpaz.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great training holster.
customer_reviews.text: Use it for the first time yesterday. Bought specifically for training purposes. Ran through paces and it held up very well. As a holster to use in training it's great. Great value for the money. Vet pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J Zulu

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT GLOCK 34 GEN 5 MOS
customer_reviews.text: This holster is great. Durable and comfortable. But one major draw back is that it doesn’t fit my Glock 34 Gen 5 MOS. The retention on it is crazy tight. Even after adjusting the screws. It seats firmly into the holster. But trying to draw it takes both hands and abnormally high force. Almost like it’s squeezing it. Will post an update in a couple months if it improves over time.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Locher

customer_reviews.title: Well made- easy draw with your weapon
customer_reviews.text: This is the third piece of equipment I have bought from Opaz. This a retention holster that the bad guy can’t jerk your gun from YOUR holster. I have two of the 9mm double gun mag holders. This is well built quality units. Hal
customer_reviews.author: Hal Gnats

customer_reviews.title: Worthless company
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a belt holster and received a paddle holster. The paddle holster was missing the thumb release mechanism. Returned same and ordered the holster I wanted (belt). Paid thru amazon pay and they received the payment. They advised they have no record of the order. Left phone message and numerous emails. Only emails returned stating they have no record. Don't use amazon pay because their policy can't get immediate results.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Tight
customer_reviews.text: Too tight for my G19 and I have to use my all energy to take my gun out which is good luck in emergency lol
customer_reviews.author: michail

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Glocks and figured I would take a chance on a holster. This little thing is well made and easy to adjust. Exactly what I needed and I appreciate the pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Hatch

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. A great holster
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. A great holster. I like the fact that i can move the holster in a variety of positions anytime i need to and it stay's until i re position it just by pushing it forward or back.
customer_reviews.author: One who knows

customer_reviews.title: Great holster
customer_reviews.text: Really love this gives easy access to a glock with the quick release button I clip it onto my tactical belt and it holds well on my leg .
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Reall good kydex style holster
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Ruger Securtiy 9, got the glock 19 frame cut and the gun fits perfectly, The only downside to this holster is if you need the gun to be secured to your body, there is no safety button or release switch to press. Just pull the handgun straight out.
customer_reviews.author: Broc Newton

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Arrives with tension fairly loose, so you will need to adjust to custom fit you. Holds very well so far. Pretty good concealability 1to 10 gets a 7 even with a full size 31 holding 22 rd mag. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Melton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, perfect price!!!
customer_reviews.text: This item fits like a glove for my G19/G26. Great fit. Easy adjustments can be made to where it can be removed easily but still had great retention with very tight tolerances.
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Ocampo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Holster
customer_reviews.text: I waited for several weeks and used this before I wrote this review. It fits my Glock 22 perfectly and rides nice. It requires some practice to get used to the tension restraint and testing different retention pressures but after that it has performed flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: greggm

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Amazing retention. Love how the thumb allows release from the holster. Fits my Glock 17 and 26 perfect. Don’t let the price fool you, this is an extremely high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: K_dog

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price point
customer_reviews.text: Run my glock 19 with a vortex venom red dot sight. Was worried i would have to trim a bit off the top edge so it would clear the sight but nope, works perfectly. Holds the gun in nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Hip

customer_reviews.title: Looks like dependable kit
customer_reviews.text: Liked it - release like the Omnivore so it’s consistent with my OWB carriers whether it is as a backpack holster or on my carrier. Haven’t really beat it up yet but looks like good solid kit.
customer_reviews.author: ITD Systems

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of how the straps adjust, A heavy duty Velcro would be more practical. Other than that, It’s perfect. My glock 27 gen 3 .40 fits in it perfect as does my husbands glock 31 gen 4 .357 sig. I love the level 2 safety. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 27
customer_reviews.text: Great for my glock 27. Perfect fit and well worth the amount paid. I can confirm this will not fit the Glock 19X as I've tried due to the ambidextrous slide lock.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: comfortable holster & great thumb release
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Easy to fit - I good use a tighter fit on the thigh straps. I did not think I would like the thumb release - but now I feel it out performs my trigger release holster .
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Glock 23
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very adjustable, solid overall. Safety feature is not an issue for rapid draw - keeps pistol securely in place. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Parks

customer_reviews.title: $16.00 holster
customer_reviews.text: For a $16.00 holster it is pretty nice. I purchased it for my Glock 35. I do have one complaint though. There is a small lip on the lower part of the holster that will probably scratch the slide of your pistol with use. I took a couple of minutes and filed it smooth. It seems well built and I have no doubt it will be durable. It fit the 35 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down one of the beat holsters I own. Easy to mount onto MOLLE webbing and perfect for my pistols.
customer_reviews.author: ClayinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase all around. Arrived when promised. Fit beautifully. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect. I had been reading reviews about this style holster and was worried about my weapon getting scratched. I worried for nothing. It locks in the weapon nice and secure. I have a kiddo and don’t want any accidents happening. Delivered like promised. I am extremely happy with my purchase. I have a Glock 22 gen 4. Cannot beat the price too. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos W.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very good holster. As good as very expensive ones. Retention is good but you can still draw easily.
customer_reviews.author: george mundy

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, this holster came with a couple missing pieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this holster came with a couple missing pieces. Most importantly being the loop that your belt is threaded through. It was extremely difficult to tighten and loosen the leg straps also. If you need to make an adjustment quickly during training or out in the field, it won't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Audra C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Holster! Love the thumb lock, don't feel like I am going to lose my gun if I'm climbing around rocks and things.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Holster. I have used it about 5 times trapping raccoons and relocating them. Not sure if they were rabid so wanted to have my Glock on my hip ready to go if I needed to shoot them.
customer_reviews.author: My Computer Guy Joe

customer_reviews.title: Solid product... but more costly here
customer_reviews.text: No buyer's remorse - Recent and robust... very adjustable.... fits well. Buyer's remorse - Cost through Amazon is $30 higher than I found later on another website.
customer_reviews.author: LMA

customer_reviews.title: Good fit Glock 26
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my Glock 26 fits snug so it won't fall out on it own and it holds great on my belt.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Retention system didn't work (Level 2 Thumb Button version)
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Level 2 Thumb Button version for my Glock 17, but the thumb button didn't retain it. The gun fits in the holster just fine, but the spring behind the stopper is so weak that it's very easy to just draw without pressing the release.
customer_reviews.author: Tb0neguy

customer_reviews.title: Great holster for a Glock 19 MOS with an optic!
customer_reviews.text: It definitely will fit a Glock 19 Gen 4 with a Burris FastFire 2 or a Vortex Viper red dot. I took a chance and tried it. I’m very impressed!
customer_reviews.author: C P

customer_reviews.title: Not for police use ( molle variation)
customer_reviews.text: At first I wrote a nice review because of the nice materials and small form factor but this product is actually not practical for police use since the molle variation on the first fork adaptor doesn't have a securing mechanism as the second one makes it really easy when you run you risk the danger of dropping your gun so I would highly suggest a change of the desing otherwise don't get this it will only get you in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Jacobo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit glock 19.
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely did not fit my glock 19 at all. Don't waste your time with these liars.
customer_reviews.author: michael e.

customer_reviews.title: Holster is pretty neat only down fall I have with it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Holster is pretty neat only down fall I have with it is the thumb safety is a bit exposed so it would be easy for someone to take it out the holster if you got into a tussle. And the thumb safety is the only safety on the holster.
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed more security for his job. Also it didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Holster
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this Holster for the Glock 26, it will fit but you will have to tug on it to get the gun out, this can be a matter of life or death if your in a panic for life and you go to protect yourself but the gun doesn't come out of the Holster will make for a bad ending for you, wish I would have known sooner so I could return it.
customer_reviews.author: ADA BELL

customer_reviews.title: Loven it
customer_reviews.text: Nothing at all is disliked great holster glade i got it worth every penny and more great fit too
customer_reviews.author: John sittingdown

customer_reviews.title: AAAAA+++++
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, great piece, piece is better than described. Highly recommend this seller...
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Randall

customer_reviews.title: Serious Design Flaw in Left Handed Model
customer_reviews.text: The left handed model has a very shallow magazine release cut out and a light bump will release the magazine. Unfortunately this makes the holster completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Moose

customer_reviews.title: Glock
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my g34 even while sprinting around doesnt fallout
customer_reviews.author: aloha_bensent

customer_reviews.title: It feels cheap ..but ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price.fits glock 19 gen 4 perfect .NOT for real combat or duty use .
customer_reviews.author: Extreme Rovers

customer_reviews.title: Nice holster
customer_reviews.text: Holds my G19 securely, fits well on belt and seems solidly built. The thumb release seems pretty intuitive and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Long Islander

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value!
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat it for the price. Stupid simple. Adjustable retention. I'll keep an eye out for my other pistol models!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Lyons

customer_reviews.title: I love the thumb lock
customer_reviews.text: I love the thumb lock! Fits my Glock 31 perfectly. Also it wears extremely well on my duty belt. The ability to adjust the holster for comfort and drawing position is a real plus!! Good quality, and it looks good too!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel but hung out to far for my taste and I felt exposed.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Glock 17 perfect. Weapon is secure with GREAT retention.
customer_reviews.author: Rob'z

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable holster and worth every penny. I threw my own twist on it to make it match my Glock. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: curtis

customer_reviews.title: Good holster
customer_reviews.text: Excellent retention, good quality, and fits my glock and my glock knockoff pistol
customer_reviews.author: Bill P.

customer_reviews.title: Will wear down your slides finish
customer_reviews.text: I love the orpaz holsters. I have one for my M&P as well. Do when I got my Glock 17 is was a no brainier. The only problem is it rubs excessively on the slide. Its too tight around the front half of the slide and doesn't need to be since the retention is on the trigger guard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits my glock 23 perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This holster is my favorite. It's lite ,the locking mechanism is tight yet releases quickly, and holds to my belt tightly. I just ordered the double magazine holder can't wait to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Big jim auger

customer_reviews.title: Does what its suppose to
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Glock 26. Very snug fit, needs to be worn in. Thumb release works fine. Had to clean up the edges of the plastic with a knife.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce S. Hart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, although it doesn't work with Gen5 guns, or guns with extended controls.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: The holster doesn’t mark up ya gun
customer_reviews.text: Stop! Buy this holster it’s a nice one fits the glocky 19 real good. The play and pull is good the force to draw your weapon is nice no unnecessary force. But if you got hips lol it’s a bit of a (Gabe Itch). I recommend it it’s reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Not bad worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It might be just me, but you have to wear at shirt tucked in pants or it will poke you in the side. other than that it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Elzie Bivens

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I really like this holster. I haven't had a chance to use it yet but the gun fits well and it's easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Drop Leg Holster
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a really good Drop Leg Holster for my Glock 19. Most of the ones on the market run around $150. This one is perfect for the price. Thumb release, great retention, and a solid secure fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

product_meta.title: Orpaz Glock 19 Holster Fits Also Glock 17 Glock 22 Glock 23 Glock 26 Glock 27 Glock 34 & More
feature_bullets: Designed to fit securely on a 2 inch and 1.5 inch wide Belt
Fully adjustable with M5 allen key (included) for retention and 360 Degrees rotation
Custom molded with Nylon 6 Polymer for extra strength and durability
Made in Israel by a veteran of the Israeli police SWAT unit
